dict.acceptation: 实验的；根据实验的；试验性的；

sent.orig: Experimental autoimmune neuritis (EAN) is widelyconsidered as an animal model of AIDP.
sent.trans: 实验性自身免疫性神经炎(experimental autoimmune neuritis,EAN)作为AIDP的动物模型已在世界范围内被公认。

sent.orig: According to experimental purpose, experimental factors are chosen and the level of the factors is decided.
sent.trans: 根据试验目的，选定试验因素，确定因素的水平数，安排正交试验表，根据正交试验表进行试验。

sent.orig: The simulations were to guide experimental as well as to better understand the experimental observations.
sent.trans: 模拟对于指导实验操作及更深入的理解实验现象具有指导意义。

sent.orig: Through experiments and research, the experimental designing ability of experimental class promotes obviously than comparing class.
sent.trans: 通过实验研究，实验班学生的实验设计能力比对照班的有明显提高。

sent.orig: The experimental system of digital off-axis holography and experimental method to eliminate zero-order image are presented.
sent.trans: 提出一种数字离轴全息实验系统及零级像消除的实验方法。
